channel.title: PyTorch on Aharon Sebton
channel.description: Recent content in PyTorch on Aharon Sebton

item.title: Bin Packing Robotic System
item.description: My graduate research aims at creating an accessible robotic system that can be used to test various 3D bin packing algorithms. An arm robot was integrated with a depth sensing camera so that given a random set of objects, each object can be grasped, 3D scanned, and packed into a container in a pose based on chosen criteria. A neural network (GR-ConvNet) created by RIT alumn and fellow roboticist Sulabh Kumra was repurposed to allow the Sawyer arm robot to grasp random objects that are in the robot’s workspace and in the field of view of an overhead Intel RealSense Depth Camera D435.
